div.head: TO ALL LEARned and vertuous Schollers, and gratious Studients, honour and happines.
div.p: GEntlemen, I feare, this my mistermed piece of Poetry, in your true iudgements, will be subiect to the reproofe of errour; what is amisse, I humbly leaue to your correction, and what is otherwise, to your fauourable acceptation: and so, loath to be tedious in ceremonies, I rest affectionately to all good learning.

closer.signed: A friend auowed. BER. N. Gent.
